message: I have a great product for you, Bob. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $180 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I can offer it to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
